_description: Three lines linking good conditions and qualities

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Frendsship þat is worsshipfulserte þat is
                    blisfulwonynge þat is ioyeful
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.
